body.p: Well I was just about ready to give up hope, when I received your letter today. I thought it was much more interesting than a grade five composition on communism.

By the way why did you a head-ache when you wrote me was it 1 because you had been tapping the bottle 2 or because I give you a headache? ( Oh I just of something & it’s a good thing you did have one.)

Nothing is new with me either. Sat. I didn’t do much except & get this help the boys take the cattle to the pasture. They were really weird & ran as fast as they could go. I only went as far as the sixth. (That’s enough for an old woman to run) Sat. night I took mom to visit her sister & we stayed until almost 10:30.
Sunday I went to church & Sunday school. Father Maclean was inspiring as usual.
To night I had to take Tommy to the doctor’s. He has some kind of infection on his head, right in his hair. (No, it isn’t ringworm.)
Tomorrow night Joan Hart that teaches Billy is coming over for supper, so I will have to entertain her somehow.

Well I am starting to count the days until I see you again. The first week always seem so hopeless, but the second one is better. I suppose you won’t have much time for me this time because you will have to do a lot of work with the go- karts. Maybe though you could find an hour about 1030 some evening- what do you think?
Well what do you think of these pictures that two of my kids did for me? (You should see the rest.) I bet the boys didn’t know I was so pretty.
I wrote this in bed that’s why its such a mess.
